transcript: [Music] can you get a mirror this is where this is where you nail it that's right right there oh yeah so chapstick actually some of them have SPF inside of it and so I use chapstick as sunscreen and the best part of all of this is it doesn't get on my hands the reason I never did the sunscreen to begin with is I hated having oil over you put it on your keyboard it just sucks but with this I can put it on and it's like I never touch my face and because it's used to being on your lips it's way more water resistant than anything else and so it was the easiest thing it's one of the things that I do still to this day and I really like it
